title: Seraphine Botanicals Pink Guava + Primer - Oil-Free Illuminating Primer 15ml
features: Luminosity in a bottle! Our oil-free primer is formulated with Damask Rose hydrosol & Pink Guava extract to instantly prep skin, helping to extend the length of wear of your foundation as well as infuse your complexion with light and radiance.
The refreshing gel formula is further powered by Rhubarb and Rooibos Tea extracts, which help to plump, tone as well as protect skin from free radical damage.
Shake well before use. Dispense 3-5 drops onto clean, dry skin, massaging in a circular motion. Allow to absorb before applying makeup.
Vegan. No Mineral Oil. No Parabens. No Phthalates. No Gluten. With Damask Rose Hydrosol. With Pink Guava, Rhubarb & Rooibos Tea Extracts. Hypoallergenic. Non-Comedogenic
Poids Net Wt. 15 mL / 0.51 fl. oz.
description: Pink Guava + Primer  (Tube) - Oil-Free Illuminating Primer(base eclaircissante sans corps gras) Luminosity in a tube! Our oil-free primer is formulated with Damask Rosehydrosol & Pink Guavaextract to instantly prep skin, helping to extend the length of wear of your foundation as well as infuse your complexion with light and radiance. The refreshing gel formula is further powered by Rhubarband Rooibos Teaextracts, which help to plump, tone as well as protect skin from free radical damage. Directions : Shake well before use. Dispense 3-5 drops onto clean, dry skin, massaging in a circular motion. Allow to absorb before applying makeup. Vegan No Mineral Oil No Parabens No Phthalates No Gluten With Damask Rose Hydrosol With Pink Guava, Rhubarb & Rooibos Tea Extracts Hypoallergenic Non-Comedogenic INGREDIENTS / INGRÉDIENTS : rosa damascena (rose) flower water**, water (aqua)**, glycerin*, polysorbate 20, carbomer, tetrahydroxypropyl ethylenediamine, psidium guajava (pink guava) fruit extract*, rheum palmatum (rhubarb) root extract*, aspalathus linearis (rooibos) leaf extract*, ethylhexylglycerin*, caprylhydroxamic acid,* glyceryl caprylate*. [+/- (may contain / peut contenir) mica**, titanium dioxide (CI 77891)**, red 7 lake (CI 15850), red 6 lake (CI 15850)] *VEGETABLE-DERIVED (D'ORIGINE VÉGÉTALE) **NATURAL (D’ORIGINE NATURELLE) 100% PETA-Certified Cruelty-Free & Vegan (We do NOT test our products or ingredients on animals) VEGAN . GMO-FREE . GLUTEN-FREE
